text:
London, UK | Priory Solutions | Full Time ONSITE

------------------------------------------------

We're looking for a talented mid-range or senior software engineer to join our team working on core product development. We're based in Shoreditch, we're a small software company that builds great products and we have a good time doing it. Our stack is C#, AngularJS, MVC, webapi, SQL Server, and a little bit of lots of other things.

If you like to create software, solve problems, write code, be challenged in your work and keep on learning then get in touch: rory.kingan(at)priorysolutions.com

http://priorysolutions.com/careers/

Thanks, Rory - CTO
